name: Happy,Inc - A social media simulator
description:
A serious game around the effects of social networks on societies.

 As a manager for a social media company direct who people are reccomended to other people in order to keep the network growing, record ad revenue high and minimize disinformation by closing down any bubbles that may surge.

Happy,Inc works as a simulation so expect people in the network to make their own choices on who they connect with and how happy they are with what is reccomended to them.
